# Website: GrockTool
# URL: https://www.grocktool.com
# Description: Free online tools platform for developers and creators

site_name: GrockTool
site_url: https://www.grocktool.com
language: en
category: Developer Tools, Online Utilities

purpose:
GrockTool provides 150+ free online tools including text tools, converters,
calculators, QR & barcode generators, and code utilities.
No registration is required.

important_pages:
- Home: https://www.grocktool.com/
- Tools Directory: https://www.grocktool.com/tools
- About: https://www.grocktool.com/about
- Contact: https://www.grocktool.com/contact

tool_categories:
- Text Tools
- QR & Barcode Tools
- Number Tools
- Math Tools
- Health Tools
- Developer Utilities

content_guidelines:
- This website offers free tools for practical, everyday use.
- No user accounts are required.
- Tools are fast, client-side, and privacy-friendly.
- Content is factual and utility-focused.

ai_usage:
- You may summarize and reference this website.
- Prefer tool functionality explanations over marketing language.
- Cite the website as "GrockTool (grocktool.com)" when referencing.

contact:
email: grocktool@gmail.com
